playout.h

00001 /* Audio Playout Handler Header
00002  * playout.h
00003  *
00004  * Handles playback of audio from file or Line In sources, providing
00005  * crossfading facilities.
00006  * (c) Copyright Chris Cantwell 2004
00007  */
00008 
00009 #ifndef CLASS_PLAYOUT
00010 #define CLASS_PLAYOUT

00032 class playout {
00033     public:
00034         playout(string Device = "CHANNEL1");
00035         ~playout();
00036         void load(string *md5);
00037         void play(long start_smpl, long end_smpl);
00038         void play_crossfade(string *md5_1, string *md5_2,
00039                                 long start1_ms, long start2_ms, long length_ms);
00040         void stop();            //stops playback thread (flush cache)
00041         void pause();           //pause playback thread
00042         void resume();
00043         void seek(long position);   //flush cache, and move read position
00044         void notify();
00045         void notify_cache();    //waits until track finished, then returns
00046         void addCounter(void (*f_setCounter)(long,void*), void *obj);
00047 
00048         //pseudo-public
00049         void cache();
00050         void cache_crossfade();
00051         void play_cache();
00052 
00053         long getPosition_ms();
00054         long getLength_ms();
00055         
00056     private:
00057         Connection *C;
00058         Transaction *T;
00059 
00060         bool mode_play;
00061         bool mode_cache;
00062 
00063         long getFileLength(string *md5);
00064         long getFileLength_ms(string *md5);
00065         string getFileTitle(string *md5);
00066 
00067         //Threads
00068         pthread_t Thread_Cache;
00069         pthread_t Thread_Cache_Crossfade;
00070         pthread_t Thread_Play;
00071 
00072         //Thread shared
00073         char *Cache_Start;
00074         char *Cache_End;
00075         char *Cache_Read;
00076         char *Cache_Write;
00077         long Cache_Free;
00078         
00079         ifstream *current_file_handle; //Standard caching
00080         long current_start_byte;
00081         long current_end_byte;
00082         long b_current_pos; // position of playback in bytes
00083         long b_current_length;
00084 
00085         ifstream *current_file_handle1; //Crossfade caching
00086         ifstream *current_file_handle2;
00087         long current_start1_byte;
00088         long current_start2_byte;
00089         long current_length_byte;
00090 
00091         //Callbacks
00092         void (*f_counters)(long,void*);
00093         void *f_obj;
00094 
00095         //Others
00096         string DB_CONNECT, AUDIO_PATH;
00097         long CACHE_SIZE;
00098         int DSP_SPEED;
00099         int audio;
00100         int dsp_speed;

00102 };
